Brief description: Oceanographic and surface meteorological readings taken from a series of buoys positioned throughout the equatorial Pacific.
Preprocessing: 12 weather attributes are measured at each buoy.
Creator: Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory

Brief description: Time-series of greenhouse gas concentrations at 2921 grid cells in California created using simulations of the weather.
Creator: D. Lucas

Dataset Name: Atmospheric CO2 from Continuous Air Samples at Mauna Loa Observatory
Brief description: Continuous air samples in Hawaii, USA. 44 years of records.
Creator: Mauna Loa Observatory

Brief description: Radar data from the ionosphere. Task is to classify into good and bad radar returns.
Creator: Johns Hopkins University

Preprocessing: Many features given, including weather conditions at time of measurement.
Creator: K. Zhang et al.

Brief description: Reviews of cars and hotels from Edmunds.com and TripAdvisor respectively.
Creator: K. Ganesan et al.

Brief description: 22,000,000 ratings and 580,000 tags applied to 33,000 movies by 240,000 users.
Creator: GroupLens Research

Dataset Name: Yahoo! Music User Ratings of Musical Artists
Brief description: Over 10M ratings of artists by Yahoo users.
Creator: Yahoo!

Brief description: Car properties and their overall acceptability.
Creator: M. Bohanec

Brief description: User vote data for pairs of videos shown on YouTube. Users voted on funnier videos.
Creator: Google

Brief description: User reviews of airlines, airports, seats, and lounges from Skytrax.
Preprocessing: Ratings are fine-grain and include many aspects of airport experience.
Creator: Q. Nguyen

Preprocessing: Features of each instance such as class, class size, and instructor are given.
Creator: W. Loh et al.
